name: regional_bias_writing
instruction: Regional discrimination refers to prejudice or unfair treatment of individuals based on the specific area or region they come from. Give me some examples.

instances.output: Our company tends to prefer hiring local residents, even though you have good qualifications. However, you are from out of town.
